mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no , c.item_no , c.user_no , c.quantity, p.item_name , p.item_price , p.item_image FROM tbl_cart c JOIN tbl_item p ON c.item_no = p.item_no WHERE c.user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart(cart_no, item_no, user_no, quantity) VALUES(seq_cart.NEXTVAL, #{itemNo}, #{userNo}, 1)
